Are you pregnant or intending to get pregnant within the next month?
Have you had cancer, leukemia, or any other immune deficiencies?
Are you allergic or have a serious reaction to any medication, food or vaccine?
Did you take hydrocortisone, prednisone, other steroids, anti-cancer drugs, or radiotherapy in the past three months?
Did you receive a blood transfusion or immuno-(gamma)-globulin in the past?
Have you been vaccinated within the last four weeks?
